articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance of South Side Art Troupe
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance of South Side Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with his wife Ri Sol Ju, enjoyed a performance "Spring Comes" given by the art troupe of the south side on a visit to Pyongyang at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on April 1.
					 He was greeted by the leading members of the south side art troupe including To Jong Hwan, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, and Yun Sang, music supervisor, at the theatre hall.
					
					 He exchanged warm greetings with them and warmly welcomed their Pyongyang visit.
					
					 He said that as he may have no time because of his complicated political program early in April, he came to enjoy the performance of the south side art troupe he invited to visit here, though it was given late. And he expressed thanks to them for coming here with good performance prepared by them with sincerity in a short span of time.
					
					 When Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju appeared at the stalls together with To Jong Hwan and other figures of the south side, all the audience enthusiastically cheered them with loud applause.
					
					 South side's stars sang their favorite songs energetically on the stage where the performance's title "Spring Comes" was seen.
					
					 The performers were greatly excited to see the stage being provided with reconciliation with the north and the south being as one again, while exchanging greetings with the audience and telling about their Pyongyang visit with warm compatriotism.
					
					 The performance ended with the song "Our Wish Is Reunification."
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it made them keenly feel once again that the people in the north and the south are the fellow countrymen with their ardent desire and mind desirous of national concord pooling.
					
					 At the end of the performance, audience presented bouquets to the south side artistes.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju congratulated the performers on their successful performance, warmly waving to them.
					
					 After the performance ended, he met and shook hands with the leading actors and actresses of the south side art troupe one by one and expressed his deep thanks to them for pleasing our people through their fine performance.
					
					 He said that he was deeply moved to see our people sincerely acclaiming the performance, deepening the understanding of the popular art of the south side.
					
					Saying that the Pyongyang performance by the south side art troupe has brought spring of peace to the entire nation in the north and the south along with the performance title "Spring Comes", he added that when such good atmosphere is preserved carefully and continuously, only the beautiful spring when new buds sprout and flowers blossom and the rich autumn when the crops are abundant will always be in the way of our fellow countrymen.
					
					 Expressing expectation that the Pyongyang visit by the south side art troupe would mark a significant occasion of demonstrating the appearance of the one nation, he had a souvenir picture taken with the members of the art troupe.
					
					Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Yo Jong, first vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ri Son Gwon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and citizens in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Sites in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Construction Sites in Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the construction in Samjiyon County.
					 Going round various parts of the construction site such as the Samjiyonmotka Railway Station and the Samjiyon Youth Railway Station, he encouraged soldier-builders and members of the shock brigade making successes in the construction.
					
					 A field consultative meeting called for commanding officers to unconditionally carry out the assignments of the project till the fixed date by meticulously organizing operation and guidance as required by the plan for every process and referred to measures for fully supplying construction materials.

articles.title: New School Year Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
New School Year Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A new school year for Juche 107(2018) began with due ceremonies in the DPRK.
					 Laughter of the newcomers were heard from the venues of new school year ceremonies across the country including Kim Il Sung University, Medical College of Pyongbuk University, Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, Sungri Senior Middle School in Rakrang District, Puyong Junior Middle School in Haeju City, Pyongyang Primary School for Orphans and Sindo Branch School of Namhae Senior Middle School in Ongjin County.
					
					 Officials of the party and power organs, teachers, students and their parents congratulated the freshmen.
					
					 Reports were made there to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers expressed their will to take the lead in the work for successfully carrying out the intention of the Party to bring about a radical improvement in education in the new century and thus fully display the advantages of the socialist education system.
					
					 After the ceremonies there were first lessons of the new school year at universities, schools and branch schools.

articles.title: New School Year Starts at Centre for Children with Disability
articles.content:
New School Year Starts at Centre for Children with Disability
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A new school year started at the Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disability with due ceremony on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, and children, nurses, teachers and doctors of the center and parents.
					
					 The participants in the ceremony laid a floral basket and bouquets at the picture depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among children and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony said that many successes have been achieved in the rehabilitation, nursing and upbringing and education of children with disability over the past years thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of love for the posterity.
					
					 They stressed that the children with disability would enjoy the happiest life and grow brightly and lively under the benefits of the socialist system which puts forward children as the king of the country.
					
					 The participants went round various parts of the center.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest opened to mark the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Competitions in dozens of sports events including football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis and synchronized swimming will be made in Pyongyang, Nampho, Phyongsong and Sariwon cities during the contest.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, officials concerned, players, coaches and Pyongyangites.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a senior men's basketball game (first class) between the April 25 Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team.

articles.title: DPRK SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK SPA Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK led by deputy Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, returned home Monday after taking part in the 138th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union held in Geneva of Switzerland.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes Here
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes Here
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Artistes of Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan and Armenia arrived here on Monday to take part in the First Pyongyang International Vocal Competition.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China headed by Principal Jiang Guofu Monday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The members of the delegation laid bouquets at the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China headed by Principal Jiang Guofu visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on Kim Il Sung's revolutionary history, the visitors looked round the historical mementoes preserved at his old home.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Changdok School, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: New Type Compressor Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Type Compressor Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- New type compressor with great economic profitability is being introduced in the coal industrial field of the DPRK.
					 The Tukjang Area Coal-Mining Complex has established the compressor production process.
					
					 Compressed air is produced by the water ring by the rotation of the spiral fans. The compressor is an energy-saving one.
					
					 It is simple in structure and small in volume and mass.
					
					 It is very effective in producing compressed air needed in rock-drill and loader. It has been proved that its utilization rate is very high.
					
					 It can be used not only in the fields of metallurgy, chemistry, mining, spinning and weaving, paper and agriculture but also in the fields of public health and foodstuff industry.

articles.title: Kyongsang Kindergarten
articles.content:
Kyongsang Kindergarten
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kyongsang Kindergarten in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is well known for producing many music talents.
					 Among them are Choe Ji Ye, Han Su Ryo and Hong Su Ryon who proved successful at international concours, Jong Yong Ju who was awarded a special prize at the 25th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest last year and Hong Ta Yong and Jo Mi Rae who won high appreciation at the 7th International Polish Grand Piano Music Competition-Festival dedicated to Fryderyk Chopin in Lithuania this year.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA on the opening day of a new school year, Ri Kang Juk, director of the kindergarten, said:
					
					 A series of successes made by our kindergarteners is a precious fruition brought by the socialist education system that provides them with excellent educational condition and brings their talents into full bloom.
					
					 We, educators of the kindergarten, will do our best to develop the intellectual faculties of children and cultivate their talents.

articles.title: Now Is Time to Reject Cooperation with Foreign Forces: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Now Is Time to Reject Cooperation with Foreign Forces: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Now the Koreans' aspiration for reunification is now growing stronger than ever before and the national reconciliation and unity have become a trend of the times.
					 It was against this background that the south Korean authorities joined in the anti-DPRK confrontation confab called the 10th "security meeting" with the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 As is known well, the 10th "security meeting" pursues the aim of realizing the U.S. scenario for internationalizing the naval intercepting operation against the DPRK.
					
					 The "meeting", held at the U.S. Defense Department on March 21 and 22, said that the U.S., Japan and south Korea jointly make efforts to check the DPRK's illegal activities including goods transactions and continue to take the lead in coping with the DPRK's goods transactions on the open sea.
					
					 This is part of the sinister confab to sustain the military confrontation and sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK by going against the trend of detente on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Foreign forces, much upset by the mounting desire of the Koreans for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and reunification, are making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK, intentionally throwing a wet blanket over the atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' persistent behavior of supporting the U.S. scenario to stifle the DPRK is greatly disappointing all Koreans who ardently wish to bring earlier lasting peace on the Korean peninsula and its independent reunification.
					
					 Foreign forces do not want the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the easing of the military tension on the peninsula and the national reconciliation and unity for the emergence of a reunified power.
					
					 Historically, the U.S. and Japan had stirred up the confrontation atmosphere whenever the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations was created. This was to carry out their aggressive goal at the sacrifice of the Korean nation's interests.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces are still now leaving no means untried to reverse the tide of the present situation by driving a wedge between the north and the south, displeased with the trend of the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 It is very clear that the cooperation with foreign forces is self-destruction as they seeks to fish in troubled waters by keeping the Korean nation divided and let them fight each other.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in the settlement of the national issue, they should discard an illusion about foreign forces.
					
					 Cooperation with foreign forces leads to confrontation and war.
					
					 Nobody can bring peace and reunification to the Korean nation.
					
					 Pursuing cooperation with foreign forces in disregard of the demand and interests of the nation is bound to end up breaking the north-south relations and bringing oneself to ruin finally.
					
					 Now is the time to reject the shameful cooperation with foreign forces and join in the trend of the times aspiring for the improvement of the north-south relations and independent reunification through national cooperation.

articles.title: Illegal Act for Introducing "State-Compiled History Textbooks" Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Illegal Act for Introducing "State-Compiled History Textbooks" Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the traitor Park Geun Hye group in south Korea employed all sorts of illegal means and methods to enforce a "system of introducing state-compiled history textbooks" during its seizure of power.
					 The fact was revealed through an investigation results announced by the fact-finding committee for probe into the "state-compiled history textbook" case on March 28.
					
					 According to the results, traitor Park invented a scheme for introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" in a bid to justify the fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League on March 26.
					 Podzorov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from March 26 to April 16 and decided to organize a seminar and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed on March 21.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from March 21 to April 16 and decided to organize political and cultural events introducing the exploits of the President and the achievements made by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist country under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Mar. 29.
					 The Chongryon Central Standing Committee in the letter extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un for having opened a new chapter in the traditional DPRK-China friendship and provided an important turning point in speeding up the victorious advance of the cause of building a powerful socialist country true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The letter said that his first lightning visit to China is a special event of weighty historic significance in its width and depth.
					
					 It noted that, through the wonderful event of his unofficial China visit, he declared to the whole world that the DPRK-China friendship forged by the preceding leaders of the two countries at the cost of blood is everlasting, and he paved a broad avenue of victory for the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The letter praised him as a heaven-sent peerless patriot for the country and the nation, a symbol of the dignity and mightiness of the great Paektusan nation and a legendary great man revered and followed by all people in the world.
					
					 It said that the Chongryon officials and compatriots in Japan are fully determined to trust and follow him only to the last despite any storm and stress in the world and dynamically usher in a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Mar. 28.
					 The letter said all the officials of the General Association and the Korean nationals in China extend the warmest congratulations and glory and deep gratitude to the Supreme Leader who made the first historic visit to China and thus developed the traditional DPRK-China friendship, provided by the leaders of the elder generations of the two countries, into a new high stage and made undying contributions to the cause of global independence while giving great strength and courage, national pride and self-confidence to all Koreans in China.
					
					 It stressed that his first China visit is a historic event as it demonstrated the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to develop on a new height the friendly relations between the DPRK and China, which were established in the sacred common struggle for the socialist cause and whose nature has been protected in the face of all sorts of storms and stress of history, true to the noble intention of the preceding leaders.
					
					 Seeing the Chinese party and state leaders give warm welcome and cordial hospitality to the Supreme Leader with utmost sincerity, the Korean residents in China have keenly felt again the distinguished personality and greatness of the Supreme Leader who is identical to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and more deeply the pride and honor of the nation being blessed with the great men generation after generation, the letter said.
					
					 It said the firm faith more deeply cherished in the minds of the Korean nationals in China is that the socialist homeland and the dignity and happiness of Koreans in China and the life and future of all other overseas compatriots are guaranteed by the Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its internet homepage the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence" on March 27 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), says that the President's life of 80 years is that of struggle in which he devoted himself to the people as their son. It also clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche-based stand and principle, always with the Juche idea as its guideline in the whole course of the revolution and construction, and that the common task facing the Koreans and the world people is to build an independent new world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion del grupo de artistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion del grupo de artistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, junto con su senora Ri Sol Ju, vio el primero de abril en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion "Viene la primavera" ofrecida por el grupo de artistas surcoreanos, que esta de visita en Pyongyang.
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acogido en el hall del teatro por el ministro de Cultura, Deporte y Turismo, To Jong Hwan, el director musical, Yun Sang y otros miembros principales del grupo surcoreano.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente intercambio el saludo cordial con ellos y les dio bienvenida por la visita a Pyongyang.
					
					He venido, aunque sea tarde, para ver la funcion del grupo artistico surcoreano invitado a Pyongyang, porque me parece que no tendre tiempo libre en el principio de abril por los programas politicos ocupados, dijo el Maximo Dirigente y expreso el agradecimiento por haber preparado excelente funcion en un corto plazo.
					
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente y su senora Ri Sol Ju salieron al palco junto con To Jong Hwan y otras personalidades surcoreanos, todos los espectadores les dieron aclamaciones.
					
					En la escena, intitulada "Viene la primavera", los actores celebres surcoreanos cantaron las canciones predilectas.
					
					Los artistas intercambiaron con los espectadores el sentimiento fraternal y el saludo, expresaron sus impresiones sobre la visita a Pyongyang y no contuvieron sus emociones por haberse preparado una escena de reconciliacion uniendose las ambas partes coreanas.
					
					La funcion termino con la cancion "Nuestro deseo es la reunificacion".
					
					Arranco efusiva ovacion la funcion que hace sentir otra vez que son una nacion el Norte y el Sur de Corea que desean la unidad de la nacion.
					
					Terminada la funcion, los espectadores dieron ramos de flores a los artistas surcoreanos.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente y su senora Ri Sol Ju felicito el exito de la funcion con las manos alzadas.
					
					Luego, el Maximo Dirigente se reunio con los actores principales del grupo surcoreano, tomo las manos de cada uno y les expreso agradecimiento por haber dado alegria a la poblacion norcoreana con su funcion magnifica.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que no pudo contener la emocion viendo que los habitantes de la RPDC entendieron profundamente el arte popular de la parte surcoreana y dieron sinceras aclamaciones.
					
					La funcion en Pyongyang del grupo de artistas surcoreanos trajo la primavera a toda la nacion del Norte y el Sur junto con su titulo "Viene la primavera", recalco el Maximo Dirigente y agrego que los coreanos acogeran siempre la primavera agradable y el otono rico solo cuando se defiende y se mantiene esa atmosfera favorable.
					
					Expreso la esperanza de que la presente visita a Pyongyang del grupo de artistas surcoreanos sea una oportunidad significativa para demostrar el aspecto de la nacion unida y tomo foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Vieron la funcion Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong, primera subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Son Gwon, presidente del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura, y asi como los habitantes capitalinos.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el campo de reconstruccion de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el campo de reconstruccion de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El premier Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, averiguo en el terreno como marcha el remozamiento del distrito de Samjiyon.
					Pak estimulo a los constructores militares y los brigadistas a su paso por varios puntos, inclusive la Estacion Ferroviaria Juventud de Samjiyon y la otra de la Ribera del Lago Samji.
					
					En la reunion consultiva, se instruyo a los miembros de direccion cumplir incondicionalmente en el plazo fijado las tareas de la obra al organizar bien la operacion y el mando segun los planes por proceso y se tomaron las medidas para suministrar en lo suficiente los materiales necesarios a la reconstruccion.

articles.title: Iniciado en RPDC nuevo ano escolar de 2018
articles.content:
Iniciado en RPDC nuevo ano escolar de 2018
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- Comenzo en la RPDC el nuevo ano escolar del 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					Tuvieron lugar hoy las ceremonias de inicio en todos los planteles docentes del pais, inclusive la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Instituto Superior de Medicina de la Universidad de Phyongbuk, la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang, la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Sungri del municipio de Rangnang, la Escuela Secundaria Basica de Puyong de la ciudad de Haeju, la Escuela Primaria de Internado de Pyongyang y la Escuela Anexa de Sindo de la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Namhae del distrito de Ongjin.
					
					Felicitaron a nuevos matriculados los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y el Poder, los profesores, los estudiantes y los padres.
					
					En las ocasiones hubo informes y discursos.
					
					Los oradores se decidieron a poner en pleno juego la superioridad del sistema de educacion socialista al cumplir en la delantera el proposito del partido de imprimir una revolucion en la educacion del nuevo siglo.
					
					Una vez terminadas las ceremonias, se dio la primera clase del nuevo curso escolar.

articles.title: Llegan artistas de varios paises
articles.content:
Llegan artistas de varios paises
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- Arribaron el dia 2 a esta capital por via aerea los artistas de Rusia, Bielorrusia, Kazajstan y Armenia para tomar parte en el Primer Concurso Internacional de Musica Vocal de Pyongyang.
